p: In ruminants, the anti-inflammatory activity of EO was also reported in a model of Sub-Acute Ruminal Acidosis: introducing a mixture of EO and polyphenols in the diet could reduce the number of circulating neutrophils and of the acute phase proteins Serum Amyloid A, Haptoglobin, and Lipopolysaccharide Binding proteins, that are regarded as markers of inflammation in cows [ 138, 139].
